title: AI-Based Creative Scientific Writing Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental sentence-structuring skills and general understanding of scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Creative writing education utilizing AI tools to strengthen science communication competencies

learning_goals: Learners can draft a science lab report using AI text generation tools and revise it three or more times after the initial version.
Learners can critically analyze AI-generated science essays and improve them by over 20% compared to the original.
Learners can design three or more creative storytelling structures explaining scientific concepts and implement them using AI tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
